Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.players

Class Worker

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.players.Worker
public class Worker
extends java.lang.Object
Describes a Player's Worker within a specific Game. Stores a reference to its owner (a Player), the number which identifies it, the Cell representing its position.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private int num
    The Worker's number (1 or 2).
    private Player owner
    The Worker's owner.
    private Cell position
    The Worker's current position in the Game Board.

  • Constructor Summary

    Worker constructor.

    Properly moves the Worker to a new unoccupied Cell.
    void setPosition​(Cell position)
    Sets the Cell received as an argument as the Cell where the Worker is located.

  • Constructor Details

    • Worker

      public Worker​(Player owner, int num)
      Worker constructor. Sets the player received as an argument as the actual owner of this Worker.
      Parameters:
      owner - the Player who owns the Worker
      num - the number identifying this Worker (0 or 1)

  • Method Details

    • getOwner

      public Player getOwner()
      Returns:
      the Player who owns the Worker

    • getNum

      public int getNum()
      Returns:
      the Worker's number

    • getPosition

      public Cell getPosition()
      Returns:
      the Cell where the Worker is located

    • setPosition

      public void setPosition​(Cell position)
      Sets the Cell received as an argument as the Cell where the Worker is located.
      Parameters:
      position - the Cell to set this Worker on

    • move

      public void move​(Cell position) throws IllegalMoveException
      Properly moves the Worker to a new unoccupied Cell. Before doing this, checks if the desired position is vacant so that it can be occupied.
      Parameters:
      position - the Cell representing the new position of the Worker
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - when trying to move the Worker to a Cell with a dome or a Cell occupied by another Worker
